name: Hoshi ni Negattari Nanka Shinai
nutshell: The cool and pushy astronomy club member, Takayanagi, always begs the hardworking student council officer, Kamijou, to "give them more funds for the cultural festival", but always receives the answer: "absolutely impossible!" Like cats and dogs, Takayanagi goes to pick a fight with him every day because the adorable sight of Kamijou turning red with anger makes his heart race… A cultural festival romance featuring the pushy astronomy club member vs. the tsundere student council officer!

name: Paradise View
nutshell: Company employee Hideo has been going out with his lover for 9 years. Despite being busy as a pediatrician, the younger Tomohisa only thinks about Hideo. The two of them love each other from the bottom of their hearts, but as they approach their thirties, they come face-to-face with a harsh reality. Although holding each other close, their hearts are distant, controlled by fear…

name: Love Live! - unhappy birthday (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
In which Maki has an unfortunate birthday after Nico graduates.
{ Nico x Maki }
 Artist’s Pixiv
 Artist’s Twitter

name: Die if you aren't a virgin
nutshell: On the first day of his transfer, Gyu-tae fell in love with Seok, who greeted him warmly. He dreams of a "real" first love story with him, but soon he hears a bolt from the blue. "I think men who are not virgins should die". Shocked by Seok's strange love philosophy, Gyutae, who had been in a crush for years, one day witnessed Seok receiving a ring from another man...

name: Vampire Killer
nutshell: A vampire's christmas gift is a lovely girl!

name: Cyber Newtype Story - MAD WANG 1160
nutshell:
MAD WANG 1160 takes place in the year Universal Century 1160, some 1072 years after the events of the Kyouka Ningen Monogatari - Another Z Gundam Story. The three main characters, Shiva Yips, Decoder S. Wallenstein and Mell Mekanika awake from cold sleep (cryonics) in each of their colonies and are swallowed up in the Earth vs. the Outer Space Alliance's battle.
The story is set in the distant future of the Universal Century timeline, departing from the normal setting of Gundam. It should be noted that the term "Gundam" is not utilized in this work, and it is one of the first UC works to implement nanotechnology in the story, which was also used ∀ Gundam.

name: Domina no Do!
nutshell: Tsuchie Takeshi has dreams of playing with Hikari-chan as a child. He remembers her as a kind, sweet girl. However, one day on the way home from school, Takeshi is abducted and taken to a huge house, only to find out that she's become an arrogant, violent dominatrix. Furthermore, she says that he promised to marry her! How will he adjust to her new personality, and living with her as a new son of her prestigious family?

name: Touhou - Touhou All Stars☆ (Doujinshi)
nutshell: What better way of showcasing ZUN's character than to do it pageratta style. Featuring characters from the main touhou series 6-12.8 and side characters.

name: Logout Disabled in VR Chat
nutshell: One day, 8 players were pulled into a mysterious space called the Judgement Hall. An angel, with the power to control life and death, tells them -- "Find the murderer." The process of this investigation will be streamed live to the entire internet. Stuck online, the 8 are forced to find the truth and more secrets are revealed as they continue to search for the answers...

name: Terukan Boys
nutshell: A crime comedy centered on Satoshi, Ryohei, and Kota, who formed a band called "Terukan Boys" in high school. Beyond the age of 30, the three had in common that they were struggling and living in reality while walking their respective paths. One day, the story begins when he learns that Hamada, a high school classmate, is active in the IT business.

name: Los colmillos del sr Rose
nutshell: Un oficinista corriente que acaba de incorporarse a una gran empresa durante cuatro o cinco meses. Descubrió accidentalmente que el director general de la empresa es un vampiro. En lugar de tener miedo, está locamente enamorado de él.

name: It's Not Like That
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Boys' Love,Office Workers,Web Comic,Adaptation,Full Color
nutshell:
He didn't have any experience in the working field, but he ended up applying. Surprisingly instead of sending a cover letter, he sent an unreleased copy of his novel. This drew their attention and helped him pass the final exam!
The president of the company made a huge fuss about the novel and the illusion goes beyond favor turning into love.
Will Lim Iro who hasn't experienced any social life, and always stuck his nose in his novels pull through? How will he adapt to the bitter taste of society, and will everything be as planned?

Official Webtoon: Lezhin, Ridibooks, Mrblue
Official Webtoon (censored): Ridibooks, Mrblue, Lezhin

name: G.I. Joe: The Most Wicked Unit
nutshell:
Unrelated to the G.I. Joe franchise
(from ebookjapan):

The Japanese attack Pearl Harbor, resulting in unjust discrimination against the Nikkei living in Hawaii. Joe, a second-generation Japanese American, is one of them. He is sent to a juvenile reformatory by an unreasonable policeman.

As the war situation became severe, the U.S. military, worried about the shortage of soldiers, made a plan to send the Japanese-American boys in the reformatory to the front lines as soldiers! Thus, an American captain comes to Joe and his friends, and the hellish military training begins!

name: Vampire Probation
nutshell: A vampire webtoon.

name: Spectral Regalia
nutshell:
Can you feel it?

That tugging feeling on your heart?

That falling sensation as you are forced into a deep well by the people you trusted most?

In your heart you decide to accept it, to bear it, to die with it,

yet,

even as you continue falling your decision haunts you.

A general in your prime, millions of innocents lie dead in your wake.

Feeling the end of your life pulling you in, the wall of water ever beckoning as you hit it full on.

All feeling has been lost. Finding yourself devoid of sound. Nothing visible in this darkness. No strength in your limbs. This has become your end.

But the endless has seen your life in His presence you feel the minute speck that you are, become more than what was, he gifts you with a new body with limitless potential imparted with its own endless strength. He puts you in a place where powers run rampant.

The God of all has decided this.

Your new life has the promise of excitement, adventure, love, Tragedy. Walking with purpose you pave the path for your race. Regardless of the dangers you will face you will live on for the end goal

Author & Novel link:
http://royalroadl.com/fiction/807

name: The Girl Who Could See Emotions
nutshell:
The story is about a girl who has the ability to see others’ emotion and handle them.
She comes across a boy who seems to have no emotion at all and turns out he has the same ability as hers.
Please check out the mangaka, BlandocoPaloma (pixiv id:36804017)

name: Amaterasu (MIUCHI Suzue)
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Amaterasu, a woman indispensable for the restoration of the world, has descended to this world. However, it takes 16 years for her to awaken as Amaterasu, and during that time, a group of people arrives in Japan to protect her from the Daimajin Army.
At the same time, a girl named Saya was born to a doctor named Chikura and a woman named Ayako. Is there any connection between Amaterasu and Saya?
On the other hand, a mysterious group of people are also trying to accomplish their plan 666 by eliminating Amaterasu before her 16th birthday...?
This is a new edition of "Amaterasu (1)" which was on sale until April 5, 2021. There are no changes in the content of the book.

name: The View Beyond
nutshell: Two nameless siblings: a sister with a heart condition which prohibits her from having sex, and a brother who only has sex with sleeping women. The brother has a new girlfriend, and the sister dreams of dying. What once was will determine what must be.

name: Yakyuujou de Itadakimasu
nutshell:
Tsubame Sakamoto, 25 years old and single. She relieves the everyday stress by indulging in food and alcohol in front of baseball games. Trying out different dishes at different stadiums, with adults loudly cheering around her. It might be expensive, but nothing tastes better than beer after a win. Free from the pressure of society, she will enjoy the best baseball stadium food!


VOMIC

name: Boku ga Josou Shite Hiite Mitara Baresou na Ken
nutshell: Alice uploaded a "try to play guitar" on a video site and it got over one million views. However, she is actually a boy dressed as a girl. Will her schoolmates find out about her?

name: Sousou - 2011.3.11 Bokou ga Itaianchisho ni Natta Hi
nutshell: 2011年3月11日、岩手県釜石市。東日本大震災後、津波によって亡くなった人々の身元を歯型から判明させようと、遺体安置所で働き続けた歯科助手・大谷貴子。 震災から2年。岩手県のとあるホテルのラウンジで彼女は震災当時のことを語り始めた。 「あの時の光景は、今でも忘れられません……」

name: Grendel
nutshell: Camellia, a criminal who was sentenced to death, makes a deal with the king to escort a dragon child, thought to be extinct, in exchange for her life.

name: Beautiful Legends
nutshell:
Beautiful Legends is one of the international special forces. They are a special team composed of various legendary monster. A certain girl who got eternal life because of a painting, a martial arts practitioner, a wolf man, Frankenstein and a vampire. They fight against the villains in various unusual special events.
From the artist of Solo Leveling
Oneshot Raw
Series axed with 80 chapters

name: Virtua Fighter
nutshell:
Virtua Fighter adaptation drawn by Yoshihide Fujiwara, who also drew the manga Kenji.
Kenji was a huge influence on Yu Suzuki and the development of Virtua Fighter, as well as the spread of Chinese martial arts in Japan. In fact, a bunch of Akira's signature moves are prominently featured in Kenji, so for the author to do the Virtua Fighter manga is like coming full circle.
The story revolves around Akira advancing through the world martial arts tournament and uncovering a secret ploy by Dural.

name: Guitar and Bangya-chan
nutshell:
Heartwarming yuri story between a band member and a fangirl
Links:

 Artist’s Pixiv
 Artist’s Twitter
 Artist’s Fanbox

name: Kuneru Maruta Novo!
nutshell: 'Marta is a Portuguese graduate student looking for work in Japan. She lives in an apartment alongside other Japanese girls of her age who she interacts with in a daily basis. Her income is tight (if she has any at all) so she has to resort to using un-orthodox methods to make food. Her neighbours consistently help her overcome her daily mishaps.

name: Koi ni Nare!
nutshell: Komatsu Shin was shaken when he was found out to be gay, but his roommate Nakajima was unaffected – he even arranged a blind date for him! However, the guy who showed up was actually the dorm supervisor, Shindo-sensei!
